subject: Your check is ready
body:
Your check is ready.* 
  
To arrange for delivery of your check.* 
Please visit:
http://dollardbox.com/solim?m=74393&l=0 
 
 
 
 
For more information visit us at :
http://dollardbox.com/solim?m=74393&l=0 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Real people have received thousands in cash. This is a real
opportunity to get cash. Just visit
http://dollardbox.com/solim?m=74393&l=0and
participate in our awards program. There is not any cost or purchase
necessary. Just visit
http://dollardbox.com/solim?m=74393&l=0 and
view some free offers from our sponsors. You can exit at any time
without obligation. Once you have followed the simple instructions on
each page you will be registered to get a real check that you can take
to the bank. Your cash is guaranteed as long as you follow the
directions. You do not need to purchase anything and no credit card
is required. Yes, this is real and you will get cash by following and
completing the directions. 
 
 
  
This is your chance to get real cash and it won't cost you anything
other than a few minutes.* 
Visit us today and get your cash:
http://dollardbox.com/solim?m=74393&l=0 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
*Receipt of the Free Cash and More  requires completion of offers
according to terms and conditions, including: age and residency
requirements, registration with a valid email address, completion of
all required advertiser offers from each level (Silver, Gold and
Platinum)  and shipping address verification. Subject to terms and
conditions. See site for details. To stop future contact go to:
www.am321.com/optout.aspx?siteid=fcm Or this way - 7378 W Atlantic
Blvd - Margate FL 33063-4214 
You are receiving this solicitation because you previously agreed to
receive
correspondence from us our partners.  If this service should fail to
meet with your expectations, feel free to disassociate yourself from
our service.
http://dollardbox.com/unsub.php?e=cruiseca@speedy.uwaterloo.ca&m=74393
Should you wish to contact us via the US Postal service, our address
is: 
Customer Service, 119 Rockland Center, Suite 365, Nanuet, NY 10954
